columns.name: activity_type
columns.description: A reference to the type of activity, preferably using an identifier in a recommended standard ontology.

columns.name: used_file_id
columns.description: Unique ID used to identify the file or files used within an activity.

columns.name: generated_file_id
columns.description: Unique ID used to identify the file or files generated by an activity.

columns.name: used_biosample_id
columns.description: Unique ID used to identify the biosample or biosamples used in an activity.

columns.name: source_datarepo_row_ids
columns.description: The identifiers of the Terra Data Repository rows that contributed to the creation of the record. For example, if row 123 in source table 'subject' was used to create row ABC in the 'anvil_donor' table, the source_datarepo_row_ids column for row ABC in 'anvil_donor' would contain 'subject:123'.

tables.name: anvil_alignmentactivity
tables.description: Activity table designed to capture information about the alignment process in next generation sequencing.

columns.name: alignmentactivity_id
columns.description: Unique ID used to identify the alignment instance represented by this record.

columns.name: activity_type
columns.description: A reference to the type of activity, preferably using an identifier in a recommended standard ontology.

columns.name: data_modality
columns.description: Data modality describes the biological nature of the information gathered as the result of an Activity, independent of the technology or methods used to produce the information.

columns.name: generated_file_id
columns.description: Unique ID used to identify the file or files generated by an activity.

columns.name: used_file_id
columns.description: Unique ID used to identify the file or files used within an activity.

columns.name: reference_assembly
columns.description: A reference to the collection of sequences taken as the standard for a given organism. May be defined by https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/grc.

columns.name: source_datarepo_row_ids
columns.description: The identifiers of the Terra Data Repository rows that contributed to the creation of the record. For example, if row 123 in source table 'subject' was used to create row ABC in the 'anvil_donor' table, the source_datarepo_row_ids column for row ABC in 'anvil_donor' would contain 'subject:123'.

tables.name: anvil_antibody
tables.description: May be a reference to an antibody used for a SampleTreatmentActivity or another Activity.

columns.name: antibody_id
columns.description: Unique ID used to identify the antibody represented in this record.

columns.name: source_datarepo_row_ids
columns.description: The identifiers of the Terra Data Repository rows that contributed to the creation of the record. For example, if row 123 in source table 'subject' was used to create row ABC in the 'anvil_donor' table, the source_datarepo_row_ids column for row ABC in 'anvil_donor' would contain 'subject:123'.

tables.name: anvil_assayactivity
tables.description: Activity table designed to capture information about assays related to files and biosamples.

columns.name: assayactivity_id
columns.description: Unique ID used to identify the assay instance represented by this record.

columns.name: activity_type
columns.description: A reference to the type of activity, preferably using an identifier in a recommended standard ontology.

columns.name: antibody_id
columns.description: Unique ID used to identify the antibody represented in this record.

columns.name: assay_type
columns.description: A reference to the type of assay, preferably using an identifier in the Ontology for Biomedical Investigations assay entity (http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/OBI_0000070).

columns.name: data_modality
columns.description: Data modality describes the biological nature of the information gathered as the result of an Activity, independent of the technology or methods used to produce the information.

columns.name: generated_file_id
columns.description: Unique ID used to identify the file or files generated by an activity.

columns.name: used_biosample_id
columns.description: Unique ID used to identify the biosample or biosamples used in an activity.

columns.name: source_datarepo_row_ids
columns.description: The identifiers of the Terra Data Repository rows that contributed to the creation of the record. For example, if row 123 in source table 'subject' was used to create row ABC in the 'anvil_donor' table, the source_datarepo_row_ids column for row ABC in 'anvil_donor' would contain 'subject:123'.

tables.name: anvil_biosample
tables.description: Contains information about the sample(s) included in the study.

columns.name: biosample_id
columns.description: A unique identifier for the biosample.

columns.name: anatomical_site
columns.description: A human-readable reference to the site within the organism from which the biosample was taken.

columns.name: apriori_cell_type
columns.description: A human-readable reference to the a priori cell type(s) for the sample, a human assignment of cell type without experimental data.

columns.name: biosample_type
columns.description: A human-readable reference to the type of biosample represented by the record.

columns.name: disease
columns.description: A human-readable property that identifies a disease or condition has been reported in this entity.

columns.name: donor_age_at_collection_unit
columns.description: The units (e.g. years or days) of the Age of the Donor at the point in time that the BioSample was obtained or other representative entity (test, diagnosis, treatment...) was created.

columns.name: donor_age_at_collection_lower_bound
columns.description: Lower bound for age of donor at time sample was taken. If any age at collection data is present, must specify a unit as well.

columns.name: donor_age_at_collection_upper_bound
columns.description: Upper bound for age of donor at time sample was taken. If any age at collection data is present, must specify a unit as well.

columns.name: donor_id
columns.description: A unique identifier for the donor.

columns.name: part_of_dataset_id
columns.description: Unique identifier for the dataset this biosample is a member of.

columns.name: source_datarepo_row_ids
columns.description: The identifiers of the Terra Data Repository rows that contributed to the creation of the record. For example, if row 123 in source table 'subject' was used to create row ABC in the 'anvil_donor' table, the source_datarepo_row_ids column for row ABC in 'anvil_donor' would contain 'subject:123'.

columns.name: dataset_id
columns.description: Unique ID used to identify a collection of related data.

columns.name: consent_group
columns.description: Consent group or consent groups related to a dataset.

columns.name: data_use_permission
columns.description: How restricted access to and usage of a dataset is.

columns.name: owner
columns.description: Entity responsible for curation and management of the dataset.

columns.name: principal_investigator
columns.description: The name of the principal investigator for this dataset.

columns.name: registered_identifier
columns.description: Unique ID used to identify this dataset in an external database.

columns.name: title
columns.description: A human-readable property that identifies the study which the dataset belongs to.

columns.name: data_modality
columns.description: Data modality describes the biological nature of the information gathered as the result of an Activity, independent of the technology or methods used to produce the information.

columns.name: source_datarepo_row_ids
columns.description: The identifiers of the Terra Data Repository rows that contributed to the creation of the record. For example, if row 123 in source table 'subject' was used to create row ABC in the 'anvil_donor' table, the source_datarepo_row_ids column for row ABC in 'anvil_donor' would contain 'subject:123'.

tables.name: anvil_diagnosis
tables.description: Contains information about conditions or diagnoses related to the donor of a biosample.

columns.name: diagnosis_id
columns.description: A unique identifier property for a disease or condition has been reported in this entity.

columns.name: donor_id
columns.description: A unique identifier for the donor associated with this diagnosis or condition.

columns.name: disease
columns.description: A human-readable property that identifies a disease or condition has been reported in this entity.

columns.name: diagnosis_age_unit
columns.description: Unit of time measurement the age at diagnosis is documented (for example, days, years, etc.)

columns.name: diagnosis_age_lower_bound
columns.description: Lower bound for age of donor at time diagnosis was made. If exact age is known, this should be the same as the upper bound.

columns.name: diagnosis_age_upper_bound
columns.description: Upper bound for age of donor at time diagnosis was made. If exact age is known, this should be the same as the lower bound.

columns.name: onset_age_unit
columns.description: Unit of time measurement the age at which onset of disease is documented (for example, days, years, etc.)

columns.name: onset_age_lower_bound
columns.description: Lower bound for age of donor at documented time of onset. If exact age is known, this should be the same as the upper bound.

columns.name: onset_age_upper_bound
columns.description: Upper bound for age of donor at documented time of onset. If exact age is known, this should be the same as the lower bound.

columns.name: source_datarepo_row_ids
columns.description: The identifiers of the Terra Data Repository rows that contributed to the creation of the record. For example, if row 123 in source table 'subject' was used to create row ABC in the 'anvil_donor' table, the source_datarepo_row_ids column for row ABC in 'anvil_donor' would contain 'subject:123'.

tables.name: anvil_donor
tables.description: Demographic and phenotypic information about the donor.

columns.name: donor_id
columns.description: A unique identifier for the donor.

columns.name: organism_type
columns.description: A human-readable reference to the organism type.

columns.name: part_of_dataset_id
columns.description: Unique ID that corresponds to the dataset this donor is associated with.

columns.name: phenotypic_sex
columns.description: A reference to the BiologicalSex of the Donor organism. "An organismal quality inhering in a bearer by virtue of the bearer's physical expression of sexual characteristics. [PATO_0001894]

columns.name: reported_ethnicity
columns.description: A property that relects a Human Donor's reported ethnic origins. Note this may contain both Race and Ethnicity information as define by the US Department of Interior (DOI) https://www.doi.gov/pmb/eeo/directives/race-data

columns.name: genetic_ancestry
columns.description: A human-readable property that reflects a donor's reported major contributing ancestral origins based on genetic/genomic data.

columns.name: source_datarepo_row_ids
columns.description: The identifiers of the Terra Data Repository rows that contributed to the creation of the record. For example, if row 123 in source table 'subject' was used to create row ABC in the 'anvil_donor' table, the source_datarepo_row_ids column for row ABC in 'anvil_donor' would contain 'subject:123'.

tables.name: anvil_file
tables.description: Information for files associated with the study.

columns.name: file_id
columns.description: Unique identifier for the file this record represents.

columns.name: data_modality
columns.description: Data modality describes the biological nature of the information gathered as the result of an Activity, independent of the technology or methods used to produce the information.

columns.name: file_format
columns.description: An indication of the format of an electronic file; include the full file extension including compression extensions. Usually aligns with file extension (e.g. bam, sam, text, csv, etc.)

columns.name: file_size
columns.description: Size of file in megabytes.

columns.name: file_md5sum
columns.description: md5 checksum for the file

columns.name: reference_assembly
columns.description: A reference to the collection of sequences taken as the standard for a given organism. May be defined by https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/grc.

columns.name: file_name
columns.description: The name of the file.

columns.name: file_ref
columns.description: The fully qualified path to the file.

columns.name: is_supplementary
columns.description: Whether a file is considered supplementary or not.

columns.name: source_datarepo_row_ids
columns.description: The identifiers of the Terra Data Repository rows that contributed to the creation of the record. For example, if row 123 in source table 'subject' was used to create row ABC in the 'anvil_donor' table, the source_datarepo_row_ids column for row ABC in 'anvil_donor' would contain 'subject:123'.

columns.name: project_id
columns.description: Unique identifier representing the project this record corresponds to.

columns.name: funded_by
columns.description: Description or name of the entity or entities funding the project.

columns.name: generated_dataset_id
columns.description: ID of the dataset(s) generated for this project.

columns.name: principal_investigator
columns.description: Name of the principal investigator(s) associated with this project.

columns.name: title
columns.description: Human-readable property naming or describing the project.

columns.name: source_datarepo_row_ids
columns.description: The identifiers of the Terra Data Repository rows that contributed to the creation of the record. For example, if row 123 in source table 'subject' was used to create row ABC in the 'anvil_donor' table, the source_datarepo_row_ids column for row ABC in 'anvil_donor' would contain 'subject:123'.
